title: Swap tab hero/header images with modern static banners

requirements.summary: Replace the hero/header banner images for Tasks, Dinner Rota, Calendar, and People with clean modern visuals while keeping the exact same referenced filenames and dimensions.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero/header images for Tasks, Dinner Rota, Calendar, and People appear updated in the UI without layout changes.
The image paths referenced by the UI remain unchanged (same filenames) so no broken images occur.
Images feel clean/modern (natural light, minimal clutter, contemporary look) and remain readable behind the existing gradient overlay.
